text.title: Bungalow Suite
text.subtitle: Freestanding suspended glass bungalow with pyramid roof at base of pool

features.name: Jungle View.
features.description: Breathtaking views of the surrounding jungle from your room.

features.name: Two Single Beds.
features.description: Two single beds (90cm x 200cm) with organic bamboo linen and goose-down pillows.

features.name: Convertible Couch Bed.
features.description: Sofa converts into a comfortable single bed for extra sleeping space.

features.name: Luxury Ensuite & Outdoor Bath.
features.description: Indoor vanity sink and extra-large wardrobe, plus an outdoor toilet, shower, and bathtub surrounded by jungle plants.

features.name: Climate & Smart Comfort.
features.description: Air conditioning, dehumidifier, Sonos speaker, charging station, and security box.
